subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Spanish club Racing Santander has signed Danny Szetela, a United States under-20 midfielder, from Major League Soccer’s Columbus Crew. The deal for Szetela, who has signed a two-year contract, was completed just before the transfer deadline Friday.
